description: The COMPLICATIONS table contains information related to problems that are considered complications. Only problems that have at least one column populated from this table are included in this table. All of the problems in this table will still be found in PROBLEM_LIST.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: INFECTION_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the location of an infection in the patient's body.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Wound (superficial)


Wound (deep)


Organ space


Line insertion


IV site


Fascia


Other

columns.name: INFECTION_SITE_OTH
columns.description: This item allows free-text documentation of an infection site.

columns.name: ANTIBIOTICS_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient was on an antibiotic medication prior to the diagnosis.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: RECURRENT_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the diagnosis is recurrent.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: COLONOSCOPY_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient has had a colonoscopy related to the diagnosis.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: MRI_DONE_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient has had an MRI related to the diagnosis.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: MRI_FINDINGS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the results of the MRI procedure related to the diagnosis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Meningeal enhancement


Abscess


Parenchymal abnormality

columns.name: FOLEY_PRESENT_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient had an indwelling Foley catheter at the time of diagnosis.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: HARDWARE_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient had a hardware implant at the time of diagnosis.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: STENT_PRESENT_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient had a stent at the time of diagnosis.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: INFILTRATION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the type of pulmonary infiltrate due to pneumonia.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Lobar


Nodal


Interstitial


Other

columns.name: LINE_PRIMARY_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the infection is a primary bloodstream infection of the central line.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: OTH_PRIMARY_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the infection is a primary bloodstream infection, but not of the central line.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: PD_RELATED_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the diagnosis is related to peritoneal dialysis (PD).


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: SBP_RELATED_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the diagnosis is related to spontaneous bacterial peritonitis (SBP).


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: ANTICOAG_PRE_DX_OTH
columns.description: This item allows free-text documentation of anticoagulation therapy medications taken prior to the diagnosis.

columns.name: BANFF_SCORE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks graft organ rejection grade.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Grade 1


2A


Grade 3


0R


1R


2R


3R


CAV


Indeterminate


Mild


Moderate


Severe


A0


A1


A2


A3


A4


Vascular


AMR

columns.name: BIOPSY_DT
columns.description: This item displays the result date of the biopsy test related to the diagnosis.

columns.name: DSA_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient has donor-specific antibodies.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: FATAL_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the diagnosis was the patient's cause of death.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: MODE_OF_DX_OTH
columns.description: This item allows free-text documentation of diagnostic techniques.

columns.name: OR_DRAIN_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient required surgical drainage.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: RETURN_TO_OR_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient returned to the OR.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: FOLEY_REMOVE_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the Foley catheter was removed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: FOLEY_REINSERT_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the Foley catheter was reinserted.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: FOLEY_SELF_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient inserted the Foley catheter.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: GU_CONSULT_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient had a urology consult related to the diagnosis.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: C4D_POS_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient tested positive for the C4d antibody.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: C4D_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the type of C4d-positive result.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Focal


Diffuse

columns.name: CATH_REMOVE_DT
columns.description: This item displays the initial removal date of the Foley catheter.

columns.name: TRANSFUSION_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient received a blood transfusion related to the diagnosis.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: BLOOD_UNITS_NUM
columns.description: This item displays how many units of blood the patient received during the blood transfusion.

columns.name: STEATOSIS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the degree of steatosis (lipid retention) related to the diagnosis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Mild


Moderate


Severe

columns.name: PV_VELO_POST_NUM
columns.description: This item displays the velocity of the portal vein (in cm/sec) after vessel repair.

columns.name: HV_VELO_POST_NUM
columns.description: This item displays the velocity of the hepatic vein (in cm/sec) after vessel repair.

columns.name: HEPAT_RUPTURE_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the patient had a hepatic artery rupture related to the diagnosis.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ANTIBIOTICS_YN

columns.name: HEPATITIS_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the grade of the patient's hepatitis infection.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Zero


One


Two


Three


Four

columns.name: HEPATITIS_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the stage of the patient's hepatitis infection.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Zero


One


Two


Three


Four

columns.name: PRERESIST_INDEX_NUM
columns.description: This item display the pre-resistive index of the hepatic artery.

columns.name: POSTRESIS_INDEX_NUM
columns.description: This item displays the post-resistive index of the hepatic artery.

columns.name: INFILTRAT_TYPE_OTH
columns.description: This item allows free-text documentation of an infiltration type.

columns.name: HEP_ARTERY_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the current status of the hepatic artery.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patent


Thrombosed


Stenosed


Other

columns.name: HEP_ART_STATUS_OTH
columns.description: This item allows free-text documentation of a hepatic artery status.

columns.name: HV_VELO_PRE_NUM
columns.description: This item displays the velocity of the hepatic vein (in cm/sec) before vessel repair.

columns.name: PV_VELO_PRE_NUM
columns.description: This item displays the velocity of the portal vein (in cm/sec) before vessel repair.

columns.name: AORTIC_PERF_VOL_NUM
columns.description: This item displays the volume of aortic perfusion in mL.

columns.name: PORTAL_PERF_VOL_NUM
columns.description: This item displays the volume of portal perfusion in mL.

columns.name: BIL_LEAK_SITE_OTH
columns.description: This items allows free-text documentation of a biliary leak site.

columns.name: PANC_LEAK_SITE_OTH
columns.description: This item allows free-text documentation of a pancreatic leak site.

columns.name: HEM_SOURCE_OTH
columns.description: This item allows free-text documentation of the hemorrhage source.

columns.name: COMPN_DOC_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the complication details documentation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Preliminary


Final

columns.name: COMPN_REVIEW_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specialty that reviewed the complication


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COMPN_REVIEW_DATE
columns.description: Date the complication was reviewed

columns.name: COMPN_REVIEW_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The review status of the complication


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Reviewed


Reviewed


Review Not Needed
